title: Transferring skins and champions to another account?
body:
Is it possible to transfer skins and champions to your other account. If I have a banned account and I want to transfer skins to my new account is it possible or does Riot games just suck your money because I spent quite a lot of money on that account.

Thanks for reading this, probably a no but still worth a shot.

replies.body: Nope, permanent bans are permanent, and allowing the content to be transferred would make them pretty pointless.
